definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 1. Say (subj. God Ge 3:1 + or man Ge 32:5, serpent Ge 3:1, ass Nu 22:28, horse [[יאׁמַר הֶאָח]] Job 39:25 etc.; inanimate things, personif. Job 28:14 cf. v:Job 28:22 etc.; so in allegory or fable Ju Jdg 9:8, 2Ki 14:9 etc.; esp. in narrat., [[וַיּאׁמֶר]] etc., Ge 4:6 + very oft.): mostly sq. thing said, either subst. Je 14:17 (c. cl. app.) De 27:16 f. Ju Jdg 12:6; pronoun Ge 44:16, 2Ki 20:14 +; or (usually) clause Ge 1:3, Ge 3:1, Ge 37:20 + oft. (orat. recta); with adv. thus, so Ge 32:5, Nu 20:14, 1Ki 20:3, 1Ki 20:5 + oft.; esp. ´[[כּׂה אָמַר י]] Ex 5:1, Ex 7:17, Ex 8:1, Ex 8:20, 1Ch 17:4 + oft.; the person addressed usu. introduced by [[אֶל]] Ge 3:1, Ge 15:7, Ge 22:7, Le 21:1, 2Sa 3:7, 1Ki 12:5, 1Ki 12:23, or [[לְ]] Ge 3:13, Ge 4:15, 1Sa 20:2, 2Sa 2:21, 1Ki 14:2 + oft.; rarer combinations are, [[בְּאָזְנֵי]] ´[[א]] Is 49:20 (cf. Is 5:9 & vid. [[דבר]]); [[לִפְנֵי]] ´[[א]] Ez Eze 28:9; [[לְעֵינֵי]] ´[[א]] De 31:7, Jos 10:12, Je 28:11; [[בְּ]] ´[[א]] Joe 2:17, Ps 126:2, where [[בְּ]] local; in all cases usually sq. dir. obj. of words said, Ex 19:25 being very singular; Ge 4:8 the object-clause has probably fallen out, cf. Vrss Di; = mention, name, designate Ge 22:2, Ge 22:3, Ge 43:27, Ge 43:29, Ex 32:13, Nu 14:40, 1Sa 10:16, 1Sa 16:3, 2Sa 6:22, Ne 6:19; cf. Ps 139:20 [[יׁמְרוּךָ לִמְזִמָּה]] speak of thee for falsehood (but many, as Hup Pe Dy Che, rd. [[יַמְרוּךָ]]); = tell, declare, proclaim, (sq. dir. obj. only) Ps 40:11, Ez Eze 13:7; in reply to question = answer Ex 12:27, Jos 4:7, 1Ki 9:9, Je 5:19, Je 22:9. The obj. spoken of may be referred to by [[אֶל]] 2Ki 19:32, Je 22:18, Je 27:19, or [[לְ]] Ge 20:13 [[אִמְרִי לִֽי]] say of me, etc. De 33:9, Ju Jdg 9:54, Is 5:20, Ps 3:3, Ps 71:10, very rarely by a simple accus. Is 3:10 (where rd. prob. for [[אִמְרוּ]], [[אַשְׁרֵי]]), except after [[אֲשֶׁר]] where the words used follow (cf. [[אֲשֶׁר]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נֶאֱמַר]] Da 8:26; Impf. [[יֵאָמֵר]] Ge 22:14 +; [[יֵאָ֫מֶר לוֹ]] Is 4:3; [[יֵאָמַָר]] Ge 10:9 +; [[וַיֵּאָמַָר]] Jos 2:2; be said, told Ge 10:9, Ge 22:14, Ps 87:5, Je 4:11, Je 16:14 (all abs., indef. subj., of current saying); so said in a book Nu 21:14; be related, told, of vision Da 8:26; said, told to (sq. [[ל]] ind. obj.) Jos 2:2, Ho 2:1, Ho 2:1, Zep 3:16; either so, or told concerning Nu 23:23; Ez Eze 13:12 ([[אֶל־]]); [[יֵאָמֵר לָכֶם]] = ye shall be called (it shall be said to you) Is 61:6 (‖[[תִּקָּרְאוּ]]), cf. Is 4:3, Is 19:18, Is 32:5 (‖[[יִקָּרֵא ל]]) Is 62:4, Is 62:4; hence be called, of Tophet [[לאׁ־יֵאָמֵר]] [[עוֹד הַתּׂפֶת]] Je 7:32; subj. [[שֵׁם]] Ge 32:29; Job 34:31 [[כִּי]] [[אֶל־אֵל הֶאָמַר]], Rabb. (cf. AV) treat [[הֵאָמַר]] as Niph. Inf. for [[לְהֵאָמֵר]], but against grammar; the form as it stands is Qal Pf., [[אֶל־אֵל]] being prefixed to the interrog. for emphasis (cf. Je 22:15, Je 23:26, Ne 13:27), v. Dr:§ 9 Di al.; Hoffm., however, reads [[הֵאָמֵר]] inf. abs. = imv. ‘so must one speak (it be spoken) to God.’ †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf.avow, avouch De 26:17 [[הֶאֱמַרְתָּ הַיּוֹם לִהְיוֹת לְךָ לֵאלֽהִים]] ´[[אֶת־י]]; v:De 26:18 ´[[וי]] [[הֶאֱמִירְךָ היום להיות לוֹ לְעַם]] (lit. cause to declare, i.e. through agency of Moses; on this & other interpr. vid. Di). †
